channel.title: CVE Feed for Xi S&D Inc. -- S&D smarthome (smartcare)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Xi S&D Inc. -- S&D smarthome (smartcare)

item.title: CVE-2021-26638|2024-08-03T20:26:25.500Z -- xi%20s%26d%20inc. -- s%26d%20smarthome%20%28smartcare%29
item.description: Improper Authentication vulnerability in S&D smarthome(smartcare) application can cause authentication bypass and information exposure. Remote attackers can use this vulerability to take control of the home environment including indoor control.
